ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}} 
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleSearch.author: a
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(String(java.getElements('script.-1')).replace(/<\/?script>/g,'').replace(/window\.__pinia=/,''));
list=[];
for(d of data.my.search.novelList.result){
	ll={};
	k="";
	ll.n=d.title;
	ll.a=d.userVo.name;
	for(t of d.tagVos){
		k+=t.title+',';
	}
	ll.k=String(k).replace(/\,$/,'');
	ll.l=d.updatedAt;
	ll.i=d.intro;	
	ll.c='https://img.huahuo6.com/'+d.coverImageVo.path;	ll.b='https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/detail?id=' + d.id+'&_t='+Math.round(new Date());
	list.push(ll)
}
list
</js>
ruleSearch.name: n

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(src).data;
list=[];
for(v of data.volumeVos){
	list.push({"text":v.title,"vo":1})
	for(c of v.chapterVos){	h="https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/read?chapterId="+c.id+"&_t="+Math.round(new Date);
		list.push({"text":c.title,"href":h})
	}
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{book.durChapterTitle}}|.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|.*第.*章.*|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）
